name: CRITEO
goal:
Criteo is a company that provides digital advertising solutions across devices which are based on machine-learning technologies.
The company was founded in 2005 by three French entrepreneurs, and now counts over 2900 employees across 30 offices in 19 countries. It has been listed on NASDAQ since 2013.
Criteo invests a lot of resources in the research and development of services based on artificial intelligence (AI), and has opened an AI Lab in its headquarters in Paris in 2018.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Data Protection
Online Platforms
Research and development
Tax
